name: AccessPolicy
description: Access Policy for user or user group that defines how entities can or cannot access resources.

properties.name: AccessPolicy
properties.short: Access Policy for user or user group that defines how entities can or cannot access resources.
properties.definition: Access Policy for user or user group that defines how entities can or cannot access resources.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: name
properties.definition: A name associated with the AccessPolicy.

properties.name: compartment
properties.definition: Optional compartment for newly created resources.  If this field is set, any resources created by a user with this access policy will automatically be included in the specified compartment.

properties.name: resource
properties.definition: Access details for a resource type.

properties.name: compartment
properties.definition: DEPRECATED Optional compartment restriction for the resource type.

properties.name: criteria
properties.definition: The rules that the server should use to determine which resources to allow.
properties.comment: The rules are search criteria (without the [base] part). Like Bundle.entry.request.url, it has no leading "/".

properties.name: readonly
properties.definition: Optional flag to indicate that the resource type is read-only.

properties.name: hiddenFields
properties.definition: Optional list of hidden fields.  Hidden fields are not readable or writeable.

properties.name: readonlyFields
properties.definition: Optional list of read-only fields.  Read-only fields are readable but not writeable.

searchParameters.name: name
searchParameters.description: The name of the access policy
